```{r}
library(cimir)



library(RCurl)
header = basicHeaderGatherer()
content = basicTextGatherer()

getURL("http://et.water.ca.gov/api/station/2",
    httpheader = c(Accept = "application/json"),
    header = FALSE, headerfunction = header$update,
    write = content$update, curl = authenv$handle
    )


set_key("36cd26b8-c932-4bbb-a2d3-371399661b86")

targets = 170
start.date = "2018-09-25"
end.date = "2018-10-01"
items = "day-air-tmp-avg"

d = get_data(targets, start.date, end.date, items)

```
